features: Corner Friendly Full Motion Articulating Design: This Monoprice Corner Friendly Full Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket offers the ultimate in comfort and flexibility. The unique design of this Cornerstone Series mount gives you the ability to mount your TV in a corner and adjust it to any angle, giving maximum viewing flexibility while saving space. The articulating dual swing arms allow you to extend the TV away from or retract it towards the wall, tilt it up or down, and angle it from side to side. The articulating plate holding the TV also allows you to rotate the display to ensure it is level.
Fits both Curved and Flat Screen Displays: This Corner Friendly Full Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket is designed for both curved and flat screen displays.

State Of The Art Steel Construction: This Monoprice Cornerstone Series Corner Friendly Full Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket is constructed from high quality, cold rolled steel, which gives it a strong, heavy duty build that is capable of supporting up to 99 pounds. It also features a lighter build compared to older, bulkier TV mounts. It can be easily mounted to brick, concrete, or wood stud walls.

Convenient Set Of Essential Mounting Accessories: This Monoprice Cornerstone Series Corner Friendly Full Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket includes a variety of screws, washers, and bushings to mount both curved and flat screen displays, as well as screws and anchors for mounting it to both wood stud and brick/concrete ceilings. We also include a box wrench for your convenience.

Swiveled, tilted, and extended, so you can adjust your TV's position and angle to ensure maximum viewing comfort. Versatile wall mount is also designed to fit both curved and curved flat screen displays.
body.description: This Monoprice Cornerstone Series CornerFriendly FullMotion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket is designed specifically for corner installations. The unique, dual mounting arms can move independently, allowing it to be easily installed on flat walls, or to allow centered or offcentered corner installations. It can be swiveled, tilted, and extended, so you can adjust your TV's position and angle to ensure maximum viewing comfort. This versatile wall mount is also designed to fit both curved and curved flat screen displays.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RECOMMENDED TOOLS The following tools are highly recommended for making the installation of your wall mount as safe and straightforward as possible. Some installation instructions may call for specific types or sizes of these tools. Phillips screwdriver Steel drill bit Carpenter's level Stud finder Socket wrench with sockets Power drill Monoprice Cornerstone Series Corner Friendly Full-Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket For TVs 32in to 70in, Max Weight 99lbs, VESA Patterns Up to 600x400, Fits Curved Screens Designed specifically for corner installations. The unique, dual mounting arms can move independently, allowing it to be easily installed on flat walls, or to allow centered or off‑centered corner installations. It can be swiveled, tilted, and extended, so you can adjust your TV's position and angle to ensure maximum viewing comfort. This versatile wall mount is also designed to fit both curved and curved flat screen displays. Fits VESA patterns from 75x75 ~ 600x400 Designed for 32" ~ 70" displays* Supports displays weighing up to 99 pounds Can be mounted to flat walls, as well as with centered or off‑centered corner installations Unique dual‑arm, full‑motion design ±45 degree swivel range +5 degree ~ ‑15 degree tilt range ±3 degree rotation range

"IS THIS MOUNT COMPATIBLE WITH MY TV?" Check your TV's manual for its VESA mounting pattern or measure the horizontal and vertical distances between the mounting holes (in mm).This mount supports VESA patterns between 75x75 and 600x400.This mount supports TVs weighing up to 99 pounds.The screen size range is only a suggested approximation. Your TV is compatible as long as its VESA mounting pattern is between 75x75 and 600x400 and it weighs no more than 99 pounds.

FITS BOTH CURVED AND FLAT SCREEN DISPLAYS This Corner‑Friendly Full‑Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket is designed for both curved and flat screen displays. STATE‑OF‑THE‑ART STEEL CONSTRUCTION This Monoprice Cornerstone Series Corner‑Friendly Full‑Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket is constructed from high quality, cold‑rolled steel, which gives it a strong, heavy‑duty build that is capable of supporting up to 99 pounds. It also features a lighter build compared to older, bulkier TV mounts. It can be easily mounted to brick, concrete, or wood stud walls. CONVENIENT SET OF ESSENTIAL MOUNTING ACCESSORIES This Monoprice Cornerstone Series Corner‑Friendly Full‑Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket includes a variety of screws, washers, and bushings to mount both curved and flat screen displays, as well as screws and anchors for mounting it to both wood stud and brick/concrete ceilings. We also include a box wrench for your convenience.

CORNER‑FRIENDLY FULL‑MOTION ARTICULATING DESIGN This Monoprice Corner‑Friendly Full‑Motion Articulating TV Wall Mount Bracket offers the ultimate in comfort and flexibility. The unique design of this Cornerstone Series mount gives you the ability to mount your TV in a corner and adjust it to any angle, giving maximum viewing flexibility while saving space. The articulating dual swing arms allow you to extend the TV away from or retract it towards the wall, tilt it up or down, and angle it from side to side. The articulating plate holding the TV also allows you to rotate the display to ensure it is level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This mount was perfect for my corner install, installation was simple and holds my 55" inch TV with no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install, and very durable!
reviews.reviewText: I used this to install and TV above my gaming setup, and it fit perfectly into the corner. I was surprised at how well constructed it is, no sag or signs of stress, holds the TV in place effortlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Older TV couldn't mount Traditionally
reviews.reviewText: Had an older TV to use at shop. Couldn't find a quality mount to be universal and adaptable to it. This one nailed it! Very well design, versatile and functional. I love it! The price is fantastic in comparison to others

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation. Great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very substantial all metal mount. Easy to install and very sturdy. Very good price for quality of product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV Mount, well made, 24" extension
reviews.reviewText: This mount has a slight less than 24" extension maximum from the wall. If you are using it in a corner, the amount of reach and the width of your TV will determine if you can use it or not. Very sturdy mount, but unfortunately our TV was too wide and we returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are not detailed or clear but very easy to figure out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job. Do yourself a favor and make a template for the wall mounts
reviews.reviewText: As I said in the title, if you're going to install this by yourself, have the holes pre-drilled. I thought I would be clever by removing the wall mounts and affixing them to the wall ahead of time. My thinking was I wouldn't be wrestling the swing arms with one hand, and trying to operate a power driver with the other. The process of re-attaching the arms to mounts while making sure the teflon washers didn't fall out ended up being the worse option.Hindsight being 20/20 I would have traced out a cardboard template of the mounts and saved myself a lot of awkward maneuvering.Once installed it performs beautifully.
